  rmdformats::downcute:
    self_contained: TRUE
    default_style: "light"
    downcute_theme: "default"
    fig_width: 7
    fig_height: 5
    use_bookdown: TRUE
    gallery: TRUE
    lightbox: TRUE
    highlight: tango
editor_options: 
  markdown: 
    wrap: 72
---

```{r, 代码全局设置, echo = F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = F, error = F, message = F, prompt = T, comment = "", echo = T, dpi = 200, collapse = T, fig.align = "left", dev = "png", prompt = F, cache = T)
# , eval = F代码显示不运行
# , include = F代码运行, 不显示代码和结果
# , echo = T 显示代码块
# , prompt = T使用>开始代码
# , comment = ""结果不使用##
# , collapse = T#代码合并结果
# , out.width/out.height = 0.8缩放
# , fig.align = "left","center","right"对齐方式
# , dev = "pdf","png","svg","jpeg"记录设备
# , cache = T
```
